articles.content: Lionel Messi had a memorable Major League Soccer (MLS) debut after scoring a terrific late goal to seal a victory for Inter Miami against New York Red Bulls. Despite securing a remarkable outing at t… [+2433 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Australia star suffers ankle injury at training ahead of World Cup - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Star Australia all-rounder Glenn Maxwell is battling a fresh injury just weeks out from the start of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup after he hurt his ankle during a training session in Durban.
